comment: коммент паскаля при успешном изучении инструкции (подсказки к пазлу)

languages.text: "Процессы священных ритуалов выставлены на всеобщее обозрение. Посторонним следует отвесть взгляд, ибо не для их ума сотворены священные писания".

traits.locale_text: [draft] Все понятно. Плохо что священные инструкции написаны так что их видят посторонние.

languages.text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."
languages.original_text: "Процессы священных ритуалов выставлены на всеобщее обозрение. Посторонним следует отвесть взгляд, ибо не для их ума сотворены священные писания".

traits.locale_text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."
"The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."
"The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."
"The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."
"The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."

languages.text: “圣礼已经得到了公开展示，但教外人士应当避免观看其中的内容，因为圣礼的内容并非为他们的头脑设计。”
languages.original_text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."

traits.locale_text: “圣礼已经得到了公开展示，但教外人士应当避免观看其中的内容，因为圣礼的内容并非为他们的头脑设计。”

languages.text: 「聖体は民衆の前に晒されたことがある。外から来た者は目を背けた方がいい。聖書は彼らの魂のために創造されたのではないのだ」
languages.original_text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."

traits.locale_text: 「聖体は民衆の前に晒されたことがある。外から来た者は目を背けた方がいい。聖書は彼らの魂のために創造されたのではないのだ」

languages.text: « Les sacrements ont été mis à nu et exposés publiquement. Les étrangers doivent détourner le regard, car les saintes écritures n'ont pas été conçues pour leurs esprits. »
languages.original_text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."

traits.locale_text: « Les sacrements ont été mis à nu et exposés publiquement. Les étrangers doivent détourner le regard, car les saintes écritures n'ont pas été conçues pour leurs esprits.

languages.text: «Los sacramentos se han descubierto y puesto a disposición del público. Las personas ajenas deben tener cuidado, pues la escritura sagrada no se creó para su entendimiento».
languages.original_text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."

traits.locale_text: «Los sacramentos se han descubierto y puesto a disposición del público. Las personas ajenas deben tener cuidado, pues la escritura sagrada no se creó para su entendimiento».

languages.text: "Die Sakramente wurden enthüllt und öffentlich zur Schau gestellt. Außenstehende sollten ihre Augen abwenden, denn die heiligen Schrift ist nicht für ihren Verstand bestimmt."
languages.original_text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."

traits.locale_text: "Die Sakramente wurden enthüllt und öffentlich zur Schau gestellt. Außenstehende sollten ihre Augen abwenden, denn die heiligen Schrift ist nicht für ihren Verstand bestimmt."

languages.text: "Kutsal ayin adımları alenen aşikâr edilmiş, gözler önünde sergileniyor. Yabancılar gözlerini kaçırmalı zira bu kutsal metinler onların idraki için yazıya dökülmedi."
languages.original_text: "The sacraments have been laid bare and put on public display. Outsiders should avert their eyes, for it is not for their minds that holy scripture was created."
